0.1.0.description: Archipelago multi-world randomizer for Lies of P.
0.1.0.title: Lies of AP

0.1.1.description:
# Changes
- Added error handling within the in-game text client
- Allow users with spaces in their slot name to connect by surrounding it in quotes
- Added enough legion calibers to upgrade all legion arms
- Added Treasure Hunters Apparel to the item pool
- Added yaml option to force Enigma Assembly Tool to be Early local or Global
- Removed multiple instances of quests being progressed on obtaining certain boss ergo's instead of defeating the boss
- Fixed the location for Primer for Workshop Technicians not sending a check
## Updating
-if you already downloaded any previous version you can follow the [update guide](https://github.com/Xtruh/LiesOfAP?tab=readme-ov-file#updating-guide)
0.1.1.title: Lies of AP v0.1.1

0.1.2.description:
# Changes
- Early Krat Central Station Main Entrance Key and Enigma Assembly Tool now function
- Fixed even more cases of Boss Ergo's progressing NPC quests sometimes causing softlocks
## Updating
- if you already downloaded any previous version you can follow the [update guide](https://github.com/Xtruh/LiesOfAP?tab=readme-ov-file#updating-guide)
0.1.2.title: Lies of AP v0.1.2 (Fixed)

0.1.3r2.description:
# Changes
- Items in train station in chapter 9 now send checks
- Robber's Shack Key check now sends
- Added Cube to item pool
- Added Grindstone Modification Tool to item pool
## Updating
- if you already downloaded any previous version you can follow the [update guide](https://github.com/Xtruh/LiesOfAP?tab=readme-ov-file#updating-guide)
0.1.3r2.title: Lies of AP v0.1.3

0.1.4.description:
# Changes
- Fixed a death link crash caused when games don't send a cause
- Fixed KCS2: Letter From Someone who Has Gone Ahead - behind wall when revisiting start check from not sending
- Fixed TS: Star Fragment - after Slum Resident's trap not requiring the Robber's Shack Key
- Fixed combat logic not tracking upgrades for special weapons
- added a yaml option to choose when Chapter 6 becomes in logic
# Updating 
- if you already downloaded any previous version you can follow the [update guide](https://github.com/Xtruh/LiesOfAP?tab=readme-ov-file#updating-guide)
0.1.4.title: Lies of AP v0.1.4

0.1.5r4.description:
# Changes
- Added DLC Locations and Items
- Added DLC related Goals
- Added YAML options to configure combat logic level
- Added various quality of life YAML options
- Added a 10 item queue to reduce constant crashing from large releases

## Install Guide
[Install Guide](https://github.com/Xtruh/LiesOfAP?tab=readme-ov-file#mod-installation)
0.1.5r4.title: Lies of AP v0.1.5

0.1.6.description:
# Changes
- DLC ownership detection for Gamepass store version now works
- Arche Abbey Outer Wall orange butterfly drop check now sends

## Install Guide
[Install Guide](https://github.com/Xtruh/LiesOfAP?tab=readme-ov-file#mod-installation)
0.1.6.title: Lies of AP v0.1.6
